p: The university ethics committee of the Northwest Normal University, China approved the present research (ERB no.- 20200017, date: 15/02/2020). This study has collected survey data from human participants in addressing the psychological problems induced for the COVID-19 epidemic. This study was conducted in accordance with the Declaration of Helsinki. Complying with the Helsinki Declaration and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards, this present study has completed all the procedures. Participants were informed about the study purposes, its nature, and administering procedures. They were ensured that all information given by them would be kept confidential and anonymous.
